posts.post_content:
I continue to waffle about my decision of whether to sell my T206 collection or not.  One day it is not for sale, the next it is for sale again.  I pulled back from my post of a week or two ago and now feel again, that I will sell my set for the right price.

I have also come down a little from my initial asking price.  Email me if you would like a spreadsheet of what I have and my "NEW" asking price.  I don't have any scans yet, as I might own one of the worst scanners in the world and it took me hours just to scan a few cards recently.

My set breaks down as follows:

I have 216 graded T206s

2 - SGC70
12 - SGC60
196 - SGC50
2 - SGC40
1 - PSA5
3 - PSA4

There are 10 HOFers and 6 Southern Leaguers.

I am not breaking up the set at all.  It's either 216 or nothing.  I will not sell individual cards.

Thanks,
Phil

[quote name="Ladder7" post=724491]Wow, Someone on beautiful Cape Cod woke up a little cranky.[/QUOTE]

Huh?
Possibly moving to eBay this weekend.  Will give a discount to any Net54 member from the price I will be asking on eBay.  Contact me if you are interested.

Friendly Bump........if anyone is interested in over 40% of the infamous T206 set, I have it for sale.........great price.  Just email me.

Thanks,
Phil

Hi Phil,

Please send spreadsheet and price.
Thanks.

Hank
[url]henryjlevy@yahoo.com[/url]

pretty interested 
please send spreadsheet and price
